targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type_instance" = 'idle' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu_value" WHERE    "type_instance" =~ /user|system|nice|irq/    AND "type" = 'percent' AND $timeFilter    GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "disk_read" WHERE "type" = 'disk_time' AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "disk_read" WHERE "type" = 'disk_time' AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "disk_read" WHERE "type" = 'disk_time' AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "disk_read" WHERE "type" = 'disk_time' AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk_write" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host = '$hostname'
